description:
My place is close to Prospect Park Parkside entrance  via a 10 min walk, MangoSeed, Bedford Avenue, Zen Vegetarian, Green Lake Restaurant, Peppa's Jerk Chicken Restaurant Parkside Bar, Plant fitness gyms and many many more. 20 min train ride in Lower Manhattan 10 min drive to a BQE and Midtown Tunnel.
You’ll love my place because of the location, the ambiance, the neighborhood its beyond cozy and safe. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

It's a cute studio BUT EXTREMELY SPACIOUS! original Brooklyn hardwood floor charming, 20 MINS into Manhattan.. tons of hip cool trendy Brooklyn Bars and restaurants walking distance from the apartment. Prospect Park a 5 min walk away. Large eat in kitchen if you like to cook. 25 mins to Williamsburg Brooklyn's Newest Gem!

WIFI , 20 mins from Manhattan..

When I'm in town whenever they call looking for me I'll come help ASAP ..

Brooklyn Prospect Park , Flatbush cool urban hip !

Q train 
B train 
2 Train
3 Train 
Close to LIRR
name: HUGE Bright, Hip Prospect Park, Studio
